item.title: Trump designates Antifa as a 'major terrorist organization'
item.description: President Trump announced Wednesday night that he is designating the radical left-wing protest group Antifa as a "major terrorist organization."

item.title: House Dems, four Republicans block Mace's censure resolution against Omar over Kirk comments
